system.description:
The Tactician is able to rally his men through words and deeds. Often this is done by a rousing speech before a battle commences or by barking out orders and showing disdain for the enemy in the midst of the fighting.

Rally takes one (1) round to initiate. It grants the Tactician's allies a -1 [+1] bonus to their Armor Class and +1 To-Hit. At 3rd level, this bonus increases to -2 [+2] Armor Class and +2 To-Hit.

This ability may be used a number of times per day equal to the Tactician's Experience Level and the effects last for six (6) turns.
